Part.Source:
Event Start &TabsMenuData = SecGAMTabsMenuData()
&Session = GAMSession.Get(&Errors) If not &Session.IsAnonymous If not &Session.User.FirstName.IsEmpty() &UserName = &Session.User.FirstName Else If not &Session.User.Name.IsEmpty() &UserName = &Session.User.Name Else &UserName = &Session.User.EMail Endif Endif &UserName = "Welcome " + &UserName Else GAMExampleLogin() EndIf
Endevent
Event 'Log_Out' &isOk = GAMRepository.Logout(&Errors) GAMExampleLogin() Endevent
Event 'CreateUser' GAMEntryUser.popup('INS','') Endevent
Event MenuItemRoles.Click GAMWWRoles() endevent
Event MEnuRoles.Click GAMWWRoles() EndEvent
Event MenuItemUsers.Click GAMWWUsers() endevent
Event MenuUsers.Click GAMWWUsers() endevent
Event MenuChangePassword.Click GAMChangeYourPassword() endevent
Event MenuItemChangePassword.Click GAMChangeYourPassword() EndEVent
Parm(&ApplicationId, &PermissionId);

Event Start
&GAMApplication.Load(&ApplicationId) &AppPermissionParent = &GAMApplication.GetPermissionByGUID(&PermissionId, &Errors) Form.Caption = "Permission " + &GAMApplication.Name + "'s Children - Permission Parent: " + &AppPermissionParent.Name Do 'AddPermissionList'
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Event Refresh
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Event GridWW.Load
&Filter.Name = &FilName For &AppPermission in &GAMApplication.GetPermissionChildren(&PermissionId, &Filter, &Errors) &Id = &AppPermission.GUID &Name = &AppPermission.Name &Dsc = &AppPermission.Description &AccessType = GAMPermissionAccessTypeDefault.Convert(&AppPermission.AccessType)
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
GridWW.Load() EndFor
EndEvent
Event 'DoAdd'
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Event 'DoClose'
If &ListCount <= 1 &WebSession.Remove("PermissionList") GAMWWAppPermissions(&ApplicationId) Else &PermissionList.Remove(&ListCount) &PrmIdList = &PermissionList.Item(&ListCount-1) &WebSession.Set("PermissionList", &PermissionList.ToJson()) GAMAppPermissionChildren(&ApplicationId, &PrmIdList) Endif
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Sub 'CheckSecurityForActions'
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndSub
Event &Name.Click
GAMEntryAppPermission(GAMAPiMode.Display, &ApplicationId, &Id)
EndEvent
Event &BtnDlt.Click
&isOK = &GAMApplication.DeletePermissionChild(&PermissionId, &Id, &Errors) If &isOK Commit Else For &Error in &Errors Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) EndFor Endif Refresh
EndEvent
Sub 'AddPermissionList'
&ListCount = 0 &StrJson = &WebSession.Get("PermissionList") If not &StrJson.IsEmpty() &PermissionList.FromJson(&StrJson) &ListCount = &PermissionList.Count Endif If &ListCount > 0 &PrmIdList = &PermissionList.Item(&ListCount) If &PermissionId = &PrmIdList //OK, is current Else &PermissionList.Add(&PermissionId) &WebSession.Set("PermissionList", &PermissionList.ToJson()) Endif Else &PermissionList.Add(&PermissionId) &WebSession.Set("PermissionList", &PermissionList.ToJson()) Endif
EndSub
Parm(&ApplicationId, &PermissionId);

Event Start
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Event Refresh
&GAMApplication.Load(&ApplicationId) &AppPermissionParent = &GAMApplication.GetPermissionByGUID(&PermissionId, &Errors) Form.Caption = "Add children permissions to permission " + &AppPermissionParent.Name + " for application " + &GAMApplication.Name
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Event GridWW.Load
&AppId = &ApplicationId &Filter.Name = &FilName For &AppPermission in &GAMApplication.GetUnassignedPermissionToParent(&PermissionId, &Filter, &Errors) &Select = False &Id = &AppPermission.GUID &Name = &AppPermission.Name &Dsc = &AppPermission.Description GridWW.Load() EndFor
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Event 'DoAdd'
&GAMApplication.Load(&ApplicationId) For each line If &Select &isOK = &GAMApplication.AddPermissionChild(&PermissionId, &Id, &Errors) If not &isOK For &Error in &Errors Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) EndFor Exit Endif Endif EndFor If &isOK Commit GAMAppPermissionChildren(&ApplicationId, &PermissionId) Else For &Error in &Errors Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) EndFor Endif
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Event 'DoClose'
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent

&IsAuthorized = False For &SecGAMFunctionalityKey in &SecGAMFunctionalityKeys &IsAuthorized = SecGAMIsAuthByFunctionalityKey.Udp(&SecGAMFunctionalityKey) If &IsAuthorized Exit EndIf EndFor
parm(in:&SecGAMFunctionalityKeys, out:&IsAuthorized);
